channel.title: 🏢 School of Data Science on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 School of Data Science on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Mitigating Backdoor Attack by Injecting Proactive Defensive Backdoor
item.description: Proactive Defensive Backdoor (PDB) thwarts malicious backdoors by injecting a hidden defensive backdoor during training, suppressing attacks while maintaining model utility.
